text: There are well over 100 languages spoken in the county of Queens.

And we have a population that reflects that,
and a very strong immigrant population.

And many of them do gravitate towards
Queensborough Community College

because of the low friction that it takes to get involved with
improving oneself and developing the skills.
Today the jobs are in cloud and artificial intelligence.

And we're fortunate that AWS Academy
has an incredible offering on those two areas.
And what they've done

is they've prepared courses
so that they're easily deliverable

to our students, where they can do
laboratory exercises and actually

bang against the actual AWS console, and
have access to significant compute resources.

And as a result, we've had over 3,000
students that have been involved with

interacting with the AWS Academy
curriculum from all over the world.

Today we've had students
pass approaching 200 certification exams.

And I remember the very first
student that passed that certification exam.

And she's got an incredible offer with a package and they're
going to move her from New York out to Silicon Valley.
I had another student,

I got a text from him, just hired
before he got his associate degree
because of his cloud knowledge, which came from AWS.

At Queensborough, thanks to
companies like AWS and their partners,

we're able to offer our
students tremendous opportunities.
